author: cargilld
msg: Fix a problem where illegal qualified names were not reported as errors.  Also store the colon position when searching for a qualified name to avoid looking it up again.

author: cargilld
msg: Fix memory leak when deserializing grammars.

author: cargilld
msg: Add support for not creating xsannotations when deserializing a grammar.

author: amassari
msg: In case of a mixed-case standalone value, the flag was always set to false
